name: chicagotribune
text: Chicago Fire Commissioner Richard Ford couldn’t help but reflect on one of Chicago’s greatest tragedies as he spoke in front of where the original Our Lady of Angels school once stood. https://t.co/Visr1QoZ8W

name: chicagotribune
text: “These things happened to me. But what was happening outside me was beautiful." https://t.co/ORQ7yIoKqE
